text: I gde by vy ni nakhodilis', Vam predstoit poznat' (vkus) smerti, (Kogda yeye chered nastanet), Yesli b vy dazhe skhoronilis' V vysokikh bashnyakh, (chto vzmetnulis' k nebesam). Kogda sluchayetsya blagoye s nimi, To govoryat oni: "Siye - nam ot Allakha!" Kogda zhe postigayet ikh durnoye, govoryat: "A eto - ot tebya, (o Mukhammad!)" Skazhi: "Vse istekayet ot Allakha!" No pochemu zhe eti lyudi Nikak ne mogut osoznat' Ni odnogo (privEdennogo) skaza
